name: Snakes (DarkKnight_VI)
description:
Snakes

In this Game, you can do what you want to do.

If you minimize the game to the corner of your screen, the grid wont be so visible, but you have the perfect game to play when waiting for something, or for wasting your time!

Spoiler: Something happens if you smash your heads.

Snakes2.0:
  • Singleplayer
  • Smoother FPS
  • Game Pausing
Snakes3.0 coming Soon Snakes3.0:
  • Game Modes
  • Settings
  • High Score
